caption.p: Sequence alignment of M2 viroporins in influenza. Influenza A M2 (AM2; strain A/Udorn/1972 H3N2), influenza B M2 (BM2; strain B/Taiwan/70061/2006), influenza C M2 (CM2; strain C/Ann Arbor/1/1950) and influenza D M2 (DM2; strain D/swine/Oklahoma/1334/2011). The predicted transmembrane regions are underlined. The functional motifs HxxxW (in AM2 and BM2) and YxxxK (in CM2 and DM2) are indicated in bold red font. Numbering corresponds to AM2. Sequences were retrieved from UniProt ( www.uniprot.org).
